list.description: President and supreme rabbinic authority of World Kosher. Leads the organization with extensive experience in international kosher supervision and establishing certification standards worldwide.

list.description: CEO responsible for operational and strategic management of World Kosher. Coordinates all certification activities and oversees implementation of global kosher standards.

list.description: Internationally recognized specialist in kosher certification of alcoholic beverages. Responsible for supervising wines, beers, spirits and other alcoholic beverages according to kosher laws.

list.name: Rabbi Eliyahu Bails
list.title: Customer Service Manager
list.description: Manager responsible for customer service and support at World Kosher. Specialist in feasibility analysis, raw material adaptation and kosher solutions.

list.name: Rabbi Elisha Salas
list.title: Rabbinic Consultant
list.description: Rabbinic consultant specializing in complex cases and special certification processes. Offers personalized guidance for companies with specific needs to comply with kosher standards.
